description: This file defines the data models for conversations and conversation users in a chat application backend. It includes classes for Conversation and ConversationUser, with properties, relationships, and metadata annotations for database mapping.

classes.name: Conversation
classes.description: Represents a chat (group or direct) with properties such as Id, Title, participants, messages, and creation time.

classes.name: ConversationUser
classes.description: Join table linking conversations and users with enrollment details.
